name: Sacred Forest
description:
Fast paced action platformer, inspired by Katana Zero and metroidvania combat. For getting the  best feeling from this game I recommend playing it in its normal level... Also, you can download the demo for windows for a more immersive experience!

You'd embark on a journey to save the Sacred Forest, a magical forest in which different creatures live but now attacked by the Selinam kingdom to steal the powers of these creatures stealing also its peace. Help the forest to rescue their leaders and get stronger with their help!

If you like the game please consider leaving a comment and your best scores after you clear the game, mine was 26 kills, 0 deaths in 04:09 minutes, can you beat me?. I'd also love to hear any feedback from you guys!

Note: there is an annoying bug where sometimes after being killed you won't get the dying message and won't be able to respawn, for that I created a restart button on the pause menu (ESC key).

All art used is not mine, so I'll link them here:

- Normal enemies: Sven Thole & Luiz Melo

- Main Parallax Background & Animated Fox NPC's: Ansimuz

- Tileset and First Level Parallax Backgrounds: Brullov Studios

- Foxes sprites: Elthen Pixel Art Shop

- Music: Abstraction & Comigo

- Male enemy voices: John Carroll
